revised_title: Continuum Mechanical Description for Elastic Type-II Superconductors
tldr: The authors develop a continuum mechanical description for elastic type-II superconductors using rigorous irreversible thermodynamics. They propose macroscopic independent variables and explore dissipation processes from vortex motion, electric current, heat flux, and superelectron relaxation. The transport properties of type-II superconductors in the vortex state are also discussed in detail.
